#Exploratory Data Analysis
```{r}
df_new <- read.csv(file="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ali-murtadho/tsa-ml-project/master/data_banjir_clean.csv", header = T, sep = ",")
```


```{r}
#Correlation Matrix
```
